Trade/Device Name(s): TEG 6s Hemostasis System Citrated: K, KH, RT, FF Assay Cartridge
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose System For In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the TEG 6s Hemostasis System Citrated: K, KH, RT, FF Assay Cartridge for semi-quantitative analysis of hemostasis in citrated whole blood using thromboelastography
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use to provide semi-quantitative indications of the hemostasis state of adult venous blood samples using CK, CKH, CRT, and CFF assays, aiding evaluation of hemorrhage or thrombosis before, during, and after cardiovascular surgery or cardiology procedures; usable in laboratory and point-of-care settings
